/work/doc/pages/ExampleOfConfigurationFiles.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 \defgroup configuration-file-examples Configuration File Examples (XML, JSON, and INI-based)
2 \ingroup configure-handler
3 
4 \details
5 
6 \section xml-configuration-file-example XML-based Configuration File
7 
8 ~~~{.xml}
9 <configuration>
10  <B3BOE>
11  <SessionId>100350121</SessionId>
12  <EnteringFirm>915</EnteringFirm>
13  <AccessKey>aasdf3993bvuO</AccessKey>
14  <TradingSystem.Name>OnixS-2</TradingSystem.Name>
15  <TradingSystem.Version>1.1.2</TradingSystem.Version>
16  </B3BOE>
17 </configuration>
18 
19 ~~~
20 
21 \section json-configuration-file-example JSON-based Configuration File
22 
23 ~~~{.json}
24 {
25  "B3BOE":
26  {
27  "SessionId": "100350121",
28  "EnteringFirm": "915",
29  "AccessKey": "aasdf3993bvuO",
30  "TradingSystem.Name": "OnixS-2",
31  "TradingSystem.Version": "1.1.2",
32  }
33 }
34 ~~~
35 
36 \section ini-configuration-file-example INI-based Configuration File
37 
38 ~~~{.ini}
39 SessionId=100350121
40 EnteringFirm=915
41 AccessKey=aasdf3993bvuO
42 TradingSystem.Name=OnixS-2
43 TradingSystem.Version=1.1.2
44 ~~~
